paramSchema.title: URI
paramSchema.name: uri
paramSchema.description: URL with username and password in line. Ex. http://username:passsword@127.0.0.1:8086/connectioncounts

paramSchema.title: Interval
paramSchema.name: repeat
paramSchema.description: Interval to run poll server at.  Defaults to 1000ms = 1 second

paramSchema.title: Delay
paramSchema.name: delay
paramSchema.description: Delay to run the poll at.  Defaults to 1000ms = 1 second

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: msource
paramSchema.description: Source to use for this connection. Defaults to the Wowza_stats
